00023 CPPlatformDidClearBodyElementNotification   = @"CPPlatformDidClearBodyElementNotification";
00024 CPPlatformWillClearBodyElementNotification  = @"CPPlatformWillClearBodyElementNotification";
00025 
00026 var screenNeedsInitialization   = NO,
00027     mainBodyElement = nil,
00028     elementRemovalTest = new RegExp("\\bcpdontremove\\b", "g");
00029 
00030 @implementation CPPlatform : CPBasePlatform
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00034 + (void)initialize
00035 {
00036     if (self !== [CPPlatform class])
00037         return;
00038 
00039     screenNeedsInitialization = [CPPlatform isBrowser];
00040 }
00041 
00042 + (BOOL)isBrowser
00043 {
00044     return typeof window.cpIsDesktop === "undefined";
00045 }
00046 
00047 + (BOOL)supportsDragAndDrop
00048 {
00049     return CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPHTMLDragAndDropFeature) && ![self isBrowser];
00050 }
00051 
00052 + (BOOL)supportsNativeMainMenu
00053 {
00054     return (typeof window["cpSetMainMenu"] === "function");
00055 }
00056 
00057 + (void)terminateApplication
00058 {
00059     if (typeof window["cpTerminate"] === "function")
00060         window.cpTerminate();
00061 }
00062 
00063 + (void)activateIgnoringOtherApps:(BOOL)shouldIgnoreOtherApps
00064 {
00065     if (typeof window["cpActivateIgnoringOtherApps"] === "function")
00066         window.cpActivateIgnoringOtherApps(!!shouldIgnoreOtherApps);
00067 }
00068 
00069 + (void)hideOtherApplications:(id)aSender
00070 {
00071     if (typeof window["cpHideOtherApplications"] === "function")
00072         window.cpHideOtherApplications();
00073 }
00074 
00075 + (void)hide:(id)aSender
00076 {
00077     if (typeof window["cpHide"] === "function")
00078         window.cpHide();
00079 }

00081 + (DOMElement)mainBodyElement
00082 {
00083     if (!mainBodyElement)
00084         mainBodyElement = document.getElementById("cappuccino-body") || document.body;
00085 
00086     return mainBodyElement;
00087 }
00088 
00089 + (void)initializeScreenIfNecessary
00090 {
00091     if (!screenNeedsInitialization)
00092         return;
00093 
00094     screenNeedsInitialization = NO;
00095 
00096     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter]
00097         postNotificationName:CPPlatformWillClearBodyElementNotification
00098                       object:self];
00099 
00100     var bodyElement = [self mainBodyElement];
00101 
00102     // Get rid of any of the original contents of the page.
00103     var children = bodyElement.childNodes,
00104         length = children.length;
00105 
00106     while (length--)
00107     {
00108         var element = children[length];
00109         if (!element.className || element.className.match(elementRemovalTest) === null)
00110             bodyElement.removeChild(element);
00111     }
00112 
00113     bodyElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
00114 
00115     if (document.documentElement)
00116         document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
00117 
00118     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter]
00119         postNotificationName:CPPlatformDidClearBodyElementNotification
00120                       object:self];
00121 }
00122 
00123 @end
